select a.*, (select goods_name from orders where no = a.back_no) as goods_name, (select order_qty from orders where no = a.back_no) as order_qty, (select order_no from orders where no = a.back_no) as order_no, (select order_price from orders where no = a.back_no) as order_price, (select goods_color from orders where no = a.back_no) as goods_color from back_list a where a.back_no in (select no from orders where goods_name like #searchKeyword#) ORDER BY a.no DESC

select a.*, (select goods_name from orders where no = a.refund_no) as goods_name, (select order_qty from orders where no = a.refund_no) as order_qty, (select order_no from orders where no = a.refund_no) as order_no, (select order_price from orders where no = a.refund_no) as order_price, (select goods_color from orders where no = a.refund_no) as goods_color from refund_list a where a.refund_no in (select no from orders where goods_name like #searchKeyword#) ORDER BY a.no DESC

select a.*, (select goods_name from orders where no = a.change_no) as goods_name, (select order_qty from orders where no = a.change_no) as order_qty, (select order_no from orders where no = a.change_no) as order_no, (select order_price from orders where no = a.change_no) as order_price, (select goods_color from orders where no = a.change_no) as goods_color from change_list a where a.change_no in (select no from orders where goods_name like #searchKeyword#) ORDER BY a.no DESC
select * from orders where no = #no# ORDER BY order_no DESC

select (select goods_name from goods where goods_no = a.goods_no) as goods_name, sum(order_qty) as order_qty from order_rate a where date_set like #dateSet# group by a.goods_no order by a.goods_no desc
select sum(price) as order_price, sum(order_qty) as order_qty, substr(date_set, 6, 2) as datetime from order_rate a where date_set like #dateSet# group by date_set order by a.date_set asc
select sum(price) as order_price, sum(order_qty) as order_qty from order_rate
select sum(a.order_qty) as order_qty, a.goods_no, sum(order_price) as order_price from orders a where a.datetime like #date_set_value# and status = 'y' group by goods_no

sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO back_list(no, back_no, status, order_status, reason) VALUES (back_no_seq.NEXTVAL, #back_no#, 'y', #order_status#, #reason#)
INSERT INTO refund_list(no, refund_no, status, order_status, reason) VALUES (refund_no_seq.NEXTVAL, #refund_no#, 'y', #order_status#, #reason#)
INSERT INTO change_list(no, change_no, status, order_status, reason) VALUES (change_no_seq.NEXTVAL, #change_no#, 'y', #order_status#, #reason#)
INSERT INTO order_rate(no, date_set, price, order_qty, goods_no) VALUES (order_rate_no.NEXTVAL, #datetime#, #order_price#, #order_qty#, #goods_no#)
